Start Bootstrap

Static Navigation

Remove the fixed layout class from the body element for a scrollable, static layout option
Static Navigation Example

This page is an example of using static navigation. By removing the .sb-nav-fixed class from the body tag, the top navigation and side navigation will remain static in their positioning.
